column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We tried the peppered duck and goat cheese terrine (very unique taste and highly recommend trying)
column2: crab stuffed avocado (a plentiful and very tasty grade of crab served in and avocado next to a bed of butter leaf lettuce) and 6 oz filet mignon (cooked to perfection) with a herb butter sauce that makes everything in life better.  Our waiter was a diva
column3: and I absolutely loved him.  It was clear that he was passionate about the food and the venue itself
column4: which sold us on his outstanding recommendations.  AND he told my boyfriend "happy birthday" right off the bat
column5: establishing from the very beginning that he was attentive to our party :)
